chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (n : nat), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let dz := MF.degree m z in inv_hmap m1 -> exd m z -> ~ expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> ~ expf m y0 z -> n < dz -> MF.degree_aux m1 z (dz - n) = MF.degree_aux m z (dz - n)

Premises:
dart = nat : Set
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
expf = fun (m : fmap) (x y : dart) => inv_hmap m /\ MF.expo m x y : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
cA = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
MA0.degree = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => MA0.degree_aux m z 1 : fmap -> dart -> nat
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
Module MF : Sig Definition f : fmap -> dart -> dart. Definition f_1 : fmap -> dart -> dart. Definition exd_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z <-> exd m (McF.f m z). Definition exd_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z <-> exd m (McF.f_1 m z). Definition bij_f : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> bij_dart (exd m) (McF.f m). Definition bij_f_1 : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> bij_dart (exd m) (McF.f_1 m). Definition f_1_f
MA0.degree_aux = fun (x : fmap) (x0 : dart) (x1 : nat) => let (v, _) := MA0.degree_aux_terminate x x0 x1 in v : fmap -> dart -> nat -> nat Argument scopes are [_ _ nat_scope]
degree_L1_merge_aux : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (n : nat), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let MAX := MF.degree m x + MF.degree m y0 in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y0 -> 1 <= MAX - n -> MF.degree_aux m1 x (MAX - n) = MF.degree m x + MF.degree m y0
not_expf_L1_y0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> ~ expf m y0 z -> ~ expf m1 y0 z
not_expf_L1_x : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> ~ expf m y0 z -> ~ expf m1 x z
orb_L1_eqs : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in inv_hmap m1 -> exd m z -> ~ expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> ~ expf m y0 z -> eqs (MF.Iter_orb m1 z) (MF.Iter_orb m z)
expf_impl_expf_L1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> ~ expf m y0 t -> expf m z t -> expf m1 z t
expf_L1_eq : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> ~ expf m y0 z -> expf m1 z t < -> expf m z t
Iter_cF_L1_i : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in inv_hmap m1 -> exd m z -> ~ expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> ~ expf m y0 z -> Iter (cF m1) i z = Iter (cF m) i z
degree_L1_merge_MAX : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y0 -> let MAX := MF.degree m x + MF.degree m y0 in MF.degree_aux m1 x MAX = MAX
degree_L1_merge_y0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y0 -> MF.degree m1 y0 = MF.degree m x + MF.degree m y0
degree_L1_merge_x : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y0 -> MF.degree m1 x = MF.degree m x + MF.degree m y0
expf_L1_x_y0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y0 -> expf m1 x y0
diff_x_x10 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let dx := MF.degree m x in let m1 := L m one x y in ~ expf m x y0 -> 0 < i <= dx - 1 -> Iter (cF m1) i x <> x
diff_y_1_y0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (j : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let dx := MF.degree m x in let dy0 := MF.degree m y0 in ~ expf m x y0 -> j <= dy0 - 1 -> Iter (cF m1) (dx + j) x <> x
orb_x_eqs_orb_y0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y0 -> eqs (MF.Iter_orb m1 x) (MF.Iter_orb m1 y0)
cF_L1_x_x10 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let dx := MF.degree m x in let m1 := L m one x y in ~ expf m x y0 -> i <= dx - 1 -> Iter (cF m1) i x = Iter (cF m) i x
cF_L1_y_1_y0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (j : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let dx := MF.degree m x in let dy0 := MF.degree m y0 in ~ expf m x y0 -> j <= dy0 - 1 -> Iter (cF m1) (dx + j) x = Iter (cF m) j y_1
diff_y_1_y0_aux : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (j : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let dx := MF.degree m x in let dy_1 := MF.degree m y_1 in ~ expf m x y0 -> j <= dy_1 - 1 -> Iter (cF m1) (dx + j) x <> x
cF_L1_y0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let dx := MF.degree m x in let dy0 := MF.degree m y0 in ~ expf m x y0 -> Iter (cF m1) (dx + dy0) x = x
diff_x10 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let dx := MF.degree m x in ~ expf m x y0 -> Iter (cF m1) dx x <> x
cF_L1_y_1_y0_aux : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (j : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let dx := MF.degree m x in let dy_1 := MF.degree m y_1 in ~ expf m x y0 -> j <= dy_1 - 1 -> Iter (cF m1) (dx + j) x = Iter (cF m) j y_1
cF_L1_x10 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let dx := MF.degree m x in ~ expf m x y0 -> Iter (cF m1) dx x = y_1
degree_L1_merge_y_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), let m1 := L m one x y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y_1 -> MF.degree m1 x = MF.degree m x + MF.degree m y_1
expf_expf_L0_2 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> ~ expf m y z -> let t := Iter (cF m) i z in expf (L m zero x y) z t
cF_L1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let x10 := cF_1 m x in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let m1 := L m one x y in cF m1 z = (if eq_dart_dec y0 z then x else if eq_dart_dec x10 z then y_1 else cF m z)
expf_expf_L0_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let t := Iter (cF m) i z in expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_L0_CN_2 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in let t := Iter (cF (L m zero x y)) i z in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf m z t \/ expf m z y /\ expf m t x0 \/ expf m t y /\ expf m z x0
expf_expf_L0_2_bis : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> ~ expf m y z -> expf m z t -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_L0_6 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> ~ expf m y t -> expf m z t -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
between_expf_L0_3 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let z := Iter (cF m) i x_1 in ~ expf m x_1 y -> betweenf m x_1 z x0 -> expf (L m zero x y) x_1 z
expf_expf_L0_3_bis : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf m x_1 z -> expf (L m zero x y) x_1 z

```coq
```coq
intros m x y z n.
destruct (eq_dart_dec x z) as [Heqx|Hneqx].
  * subst x.
    rewrite orb_L1_eqs.
    rewrite degree_L1_merge_y0.
    rewrite degree_L1_merge_x.
    rewrite Iter_cF_L1_i.
    apply degree_L1_merge_MAX.
  * rewrite orb_L1_eqs.
    rewrite degree_L1_merge_y0.
    rewrite degree_L1_merge_x.
    rewrite Iter_cF_L1_i.
    apply not_expf_L1_y0.
Qed.```
